title: System Supplier - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Fantasy   Martial Arts   Xuanhuan
tags: Artifacts   Buddhism   Calm Protagonist   Cultivation   Cunning Protagonist   Fanfiction   Game Elements   Immortals   Level System   Male Protagonist   Master-Disciple Relationship   Misunderstandings   Multiple Identities   Multiple Realms   Multiple Transported Individuals   Mysterious Past   Mythology   Parody   Shameless Protagonist   System Administrator   Teachers   Transmigration   Transported to Another World   Underestimated Protagonist   Weak to Strong   World Travel
author: Zao Yan   凿砚
description:
Are you humiliated by being attacked?

Are you sorrowful to be a stepping stone?

As a cannon fodder hanging in two episodes, are you unwilling?

Don’t worry, I am here!

As the only system supplier of All Heavens and Myriad Realms System Shop, I can make a variety of portable systems for you, and let you reach the peak of your life!

Boy, it’s time to raise your eyebrows!

Boy, it’s time to counter-attack!>
